com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils

Interface IConvertersFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConvertersFactory, MoodockConvertersFactory

    public interface IConvertersFactory
    IConvertersFactory interface used by mapper factories.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeDatabase()
      Change the database (close any open database and open/create a new database).

      Clear all the converters.

      Clear all the converters factory (clear all the converters and the instance).

      Clear the database (drop all the tables).

      Clear the converters factory instance (set instance to null).

      Close the database (close any open database).
